page.title: 02RESIDENTIAL
page.content: The area surveyed covers East of Ross Town & surrounding countryside exten- ding to Weston.In this block there are a total of 1262 dwellings:1068 houses, 86 flats,68 houses for the elderly, 8 farmhouses & 32 residential caravans. In the centre of Ross houses & flats are to be found mixed in between & ab- ove shops.On the residential estates houses range from rows of small terra- ces to large,spacious detached houses, as well as flats & bungalows.Many have been built specifically for elderly people & highlight that there is a la- rger than av.elderly population inRoss Ross has grown from 585 buildings with a population of 2957 in l821,to a pre- sent day total of 2500 dwellings (all Ross Town) & 8500 population in l984. To accommodate tourism Ross has 3 hot- els,3guest houses,6 private homes & 1 farmhouse - offering approx. 200 beds.
